document.text:
From: ' 
To: " " 
Cc: r' >, 
Subject: RE: GM - Draft Third Bail Opposition 
Date: Tue, 09 Mar 2021 12:40:22 +0000 
Embedded: RE:_Ghislaine_Maxwell renewed_bail_application.msg 
Chiefs -  FYI, OIA got back to us this morning confirming the accuracy of the highlighted language and attaching a letter 
from MOJ. See attached. I requested that the letter be translated on an expedited basis. I think we may be able to 
strengthen the second highlighted sentence and cite to the last paragraph of MOJ's letter, but I'm awaiting the translation. 
From: 
Sent: Monday, March 08, 2021 8:09 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: GM - Draft Third Bail Opposition 
Thanks very much. Will send to now. 
From: 
Sent: Monday, March 08, 2021 7:20 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
>; 
Subject: RE: GM - Draft Third Bail Opposition 
Thanks , we had a couple of additional comments but this looks good. We'd like you guys to send to tonight, so 
I think it's fine to keep the caveat about OIA/highlighted language in there while she reviews. Thanks again. 
From: 
Sent: Monday, March 8, 2021 6:39 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: GM - Draft Third Bail Opposition 
Chiefs, 
>; 
Attached is an updated draft of the opposition for your review. Our OIA contact in the UK had no edits on the language in 
the attached. As indicated in the attached, the OIA contact in France is still waiting on feedback from MOJ; if we don't get 
confirmation, we will remove the highlighted language. 
Thanks, 
From: 
Sent: Sunday, March 07, 2021 10:04 PM 
To: 
EFTA00018721

Cc: 
Subject: RE: GM - Draft Third Bail Opposition 
Some combined comments and questions in track. I would like to see again at some point, and I think will want to 
see as well. But hopefully this should permit you to get the relevant section to OIA in the morning. 
From: 
Sent: Sunday, March 7, 2021 8:16 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: GM - Draft Third Bail Opposition 
Chiefs, 
Hope you both had a nice weekend. Attached for your review is a draft of our opposition to the third bail application, also 
attached for your convenience. As noted in the draft, we are still waiting on feedback from OIA re France so that section 
is subject to change. We also plan to send the section on citizenship renunciation to OIA to make sure they review for 
accuracy (as we did with our last opposition). Given the time difference and our filing deadline of Tuesday, we are hoping 
to send this to them sometime tomorrow morning, but of course, happy to discuss. 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York 
Tel: 
EFTA00018722
